game.name: Digger Beach
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: It's just you and the beach. Find out what this cute sand is hiding. Collect and sell treasures, upgrade your equipment. Will you be able to find out all the secrets of the beach in a small town?
game.shortDescriptionEn: It's just you and the beach. Find out what this cute sand is hiding. Collect and sell treasures, upgrade your equipment. Will you be able to find out all the secrets of the beach in a small town?
